<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Ever Dreaming](/Feats.aspx?ID=3882) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 207</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Sleepwalker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873)

</column>

---

You draw no distinction between the sleeping and waking worlds. Your [Daydream Trance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873) has an unlimited duration, and you no longer need to take an action to enter it. If you're [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) due to sleep, you don't take the –4 penalty to AC, Perception, and Reflex saves, and don't have the [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) condition. You're still [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) while asleep. You can act on your turn while asleep, though you're [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until you fully awaken.
name: Ever Dreaming
